sentences.english: Objective To observe effects of liver enzyme inducer on preterm infant jaundice by using early.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察早期应用肝酶诱导剂对早产儿黄疸的影响。

sentences.english: Conclusions The bird nest type nursing plays a facilitative role in growth and development of premature infants.
sentences.chinese: 结论鸟巢式护理有利于早产儿的生长发育。

sentences.english: Our babies were premies so we were even more concerned for their tender skin.
sentences.chinese: 但宝宝们是早产儿，所有我哦更关注他们娇嫩的肌肤。

sentences.english: "This is a significant step forward in the search for future treatments for preterm labour," says Dr Tribe.
sentences.chinese: 这项结果对今后早产治疗研究是有长远意义的。

sentences.english: It seems that ROP may relate with genetic factors.
sentences.chinese: 由此表明早产儿视网膜病变可能与遗传因素有关。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Erythropoietin can cure all varieties to premature infants with anemia effectively.
sentences.chinese: 结论红细胞生成素能有效地治疗各种早产儿贫血。

sentences.english: Objective:Introduce the application of erythropoietin to premature infants with anemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍红细胞生成素在早产儿的应用。

sentences.english: Frogleg position in a preterm infant of 31 weeks gestation, 2 weeks after birth.
sentences.chinese: 此为一胎龄31周的早产儿生后2周，呈蛙腿式姿势。

sentences.english: Conclusions Premature delivery is the main causes of neonate illness and death.
sentences.chinese: 结论早产是新生儿发病和死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: How could this contribute to our understanding of the Mozart effect on premature babies?
sentences.chinese: 这将如何增进我们对早产儿的莫扎特效应的理解的呢？

sentences.english: Some mothers in Senegal are learning a new way to save the lives of babies born too soon.
sentences.chinese: 塞尼加尔的母亲们正在学一种挽救早产儿的新方法。

sentences.english: Conclusions Intrauterine hypoxia ischemia and infection are two high risk factors of PVL in premature infants.
sentences.chinese: 结论宫内缺氧缺血和感染是早产儿PVL的高危因素。

sentences.english: Preemies : Risk of High Blood Pressure?
sentences.chinese: 早产儿有高血压的风险？

sentences.english: Medical equipment surrounds this premature baby in an incubator.
sentences.chinese: 在恒温箱里，早产宝宝身上带满了各种医疗器械。

sentences.english: OneA major reason isprematuralityprematurity- the death rates are among the highest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 一个主要的原因是早产，其死亡率在全球是最高的。

definition: to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
